page.title: 13TRADE
page.content:
Oxhill is the only village of the three to have a shop.It was a combined shop and Post Office but during 1985 the shop closed due to lack of support from local people.Only the Post Office remains.
RESIDENT TRADESMEN OR BUSINESSES
